summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1680, for the improvement of West Sixty-fourth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to a point Three Hundred (300) feet west of the west margin of Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of the district, under Ordinance No. 17703, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
